featured.text: Anything from getting a bad grade on a test to losing an important game can make you feel sad.
The disciple felt sad to hear this, but he agreed to do as he was told.
The woman is so that she cries every time she hears a sad story.
Peanuts is sad over the possibility of losing his grandfather.
Often they write about real or make-believe people, places, or events that may be funny, sad, or scary.

definition.zh_def: 感到不快樂或沮喪的情緒狀態。
definition.example: She felt sad when she heard the news.
